title: Blade, R. Kelly, Eddie Murphy, Mueller Testimony and more.
itunes:title: Blade, R. Kelly, Eddie Murphy, Mueller Testimony and more.
description:
Good morning and Happy Humpday!  Have you ever had a car ride with relatives that you didn't like?  That is how today starts.  This licking food craze has people scratching their heads.  We have the list of certain foods that no one wants to lick.  Wesley Snipes the original Blade is a good sport and supports Marvel's decision to re-boot without him.  R. Kelly's crisis manager steps down after making controversial remarks during an interview with Gayle King.  A belligerent woman was asked to leave an airline after cussing her significant other out in front of everyone.  In Tell Me Something Good we have a story of two kids from Delaware spreading a little black girl magic.  Robert Mueller testifies as we speak.  Eddie Murphy reaches deal with Netflix worth $70 million to return to stand up.  Today in J's What We Learned Today the crew have certain questions regarding what they learned concerning Robert Mueller and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
